title: Can't open the actual download client
body:
I am unable to install the game, It loads very slowly as shown in the Screenshot.
Once it has loaded it downloads maxing at 15kbp/s.
I am using the Korean Client, living in the UK.
Speedtest results: 48.53 Mbps download / 10.10 Mbps upload.

Kingston 130gb ssd drive with nvidia 9800 1gb graphics card.
Intel I7 quad-core processor.

replies.body: The Korean Client is supported by another region, so you're likely to run into issues if you're trying to reach an EU region.  Your best bet would be to run your [region's supported client](https://signup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload) instead.  I hope that helps!
